verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> abode יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> And Israel בַּשִּׁטִּ֑ים <WH7851> in Shittim וַיָּ֣חֶל <WH2490> began הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and the people לִזְנ֖וֹת <WH2181> to commit whoredom אֶל־ <WH413> with בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> with the daughters מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַתִּקְרֶ֣אןָ <WH7121> And they called לָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people לְזִבְחֵ֖י <WH2077> unto the sacrifices אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ן <WH430> of their gods וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> did eat הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and the people וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֖וּ <WH7812> and bowed down לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH430> to their gods

וַיִּצָּ֥מֶד <WH6775> joined יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> And Israel לְבַ֣עַל פְּע֑וֹר <WH1187> himself unto Baalpeor וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֥ף <WH639> and the anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> against Israel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses קַ֚ח <WH3947> Take אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> all the heads הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people וְהוֹקַ֥ע <WH3363> and hang them up אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> before הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> against the sun וְיָשֹׁ֛ב <WH7725> may be turned away חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> that the fierce אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> from Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to שֹׁפְטֵ֖י <WH8199> unto the judges יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הִרְגוּ֙ <WH2026> Slay אִ֣ישׁ <WH582> his men אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH582> who הַנִּצְמָדִ֖ים <WH6775> that were joined לְבַ֥עַל פְּעֽוֹר׃ <WH1187> unto Baalpeor

וְהִנֵּ֡ה <WH2009> behold אִישׁ֩ <WH376> And behold one מִבְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּ֗א <WH935> came וַיַּקְרֵ֤ב <WH7126> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> unto his brethren אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּדְיָנִ֔ית <WH4084> a Midianitish woman לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses וּלְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> and in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> of all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they בֹכִ֔ים <WH1058> who [were] weeping פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [before] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> saw פִּֽינְחָס֙ <WH6372> And when Phinehas בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> of Eleazar בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> [it] he rose up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> from among הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> the congregation וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> and took רֹ֖מַח <WH7420> a javelin בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וַ֠יָּבֹא <WH935> And he went אַחַ֨ר <WH310> after אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> the man יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> through הַקֻּבָּ֗ה <WH6898> into the tent וַיִּדְקֹר֙ <WH1856> and thrust אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> both אֵ֚ת <WH853> אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of them through the man יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> and the woman אֶל־ <WH413> through קֳבָתָ֑הּ <WH6897> her belly וַתֵּֽעָצַר֙ <WH6113> was stayed הַמַּגֵּפָ֔ה <WH4046> So the plague מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> on בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> from the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
וַיִּהְי֕וּ <WH1961> become הַמֵּתִ֖ים <WH4191> And those that died בַּמַּגֵּפָ֑ה <WH4046> in the plague אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> and four וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> were twenty אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

פִּֽינְחָ֨ס <WH6372> Phinehas בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְעָזָ֜ר <WH499> of Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> the priest הֵשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> away אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> my wrath מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> from the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּקַנְא֥וֹ <WH7068> for my sake אֶת־ <WH853> קִנְאָתִ֖י <WH7068> in my jealousy בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> among וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not כִלִּ֥יתִי <WH3615> them that I consumed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> not the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּקִנְאָתִֽי׃ <WH7068> my jealousy
לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֑ר <WH559> Wherefore say הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> Behold I give ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> unto him my covenant שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> of peace

וְהָ֤יְתָה <WH1961> become לּוֹ֙ וּלְזַרְע֣וֹ <WH2233> And he shall have it and his seed אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> after בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> him [even] the covenant כְּהֻנַּ֣ת <WH3550> priesthood עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> of an everlasting תַּ֗חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> because קִנֵּא֙ <WH7065> he was zealous לֵֽאלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> for his God וַיְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> and made an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> for בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְשֵׁם֩ <WH8034> Now the name אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> of the Israelite יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel הַמֻּכֶּ֗ה <WH5221> that was slain אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הֻכָּה֙ <WH5221> [even] that was slain אֶת־ <WH854> with הַמִּדְיָנִ֔ית <WH4084> with the Midianitish woman זִמְרִ֖י <WH2174> [was] Zimri בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son סָל֑וּא <WH5543> of Salu נְשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> a prince בֵֽית־ <WH1004> house אָ֖ב <WH1> of a chief לַשִּׁמְעֹנִֽי׃ <WH8099> among the Simeonites

וְשֵׁ֨ם <WH8034> And the name הָֽאִשָּׁ֧ה <WH802> woman הַמֻּכָּ֛ה <WH5221> that was slain הַמִּדְיָנִ֖ית <WH4084> of the Midianitish כָּזְבִּ֣י <WH3579> [was] Cozbi בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter צ֑וּר <WH6698> of Zur רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> he [was] head אֻמּ֥וֹת <WH523> over a people בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> house אָ֛ב <WH1> [and] of a chief בְּמִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> in Midian הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> who פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying
צָר֖וֹר <WH6887> Vex אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּדְיָנִ֑ים <WH4084> the Midianites וְהִכִּיתֶ֖ם <WH5221> and smite אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for צֹרְרִ֥ים <WH6887> For they vex הֵם֙ <WH1992> like לָכֶ֔ם בְּנִכְלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5231> you with their wiles אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִכְּל֥וּ <WH5230> wherewith they have beguiled לָכֶ֖ם עַל־ <WH5921> in דְּבַר־ <WH1697> you in the matter פְּע֑וֹר <WH6465> of Peor וְעַל־ <WH5921> and in דְּבַ֞ר <WH1697> and in the matter כָּזְבִּ֨י <WH3579> of Cozbi בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter נְשִׂ֤יא <WH5387> of a prince מִדְיָן֙ <WH4080> of Midian אֲחֹתָ֔ם <WH269> their sister הַמֻּכָּ֥ה <WH5221> which was slain בְיוֹם־ <WH3117> in the day הַמַּגֵּפָ֖ה <WH4046> of the plague עַל־ <WH5921> in דְּבַר־ <WH1697> sake פְּעֽוֹר׃ <WH6465> for Peor's וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after that הַמַּגֵּפָ֑ה <WH4046> of the plague פ
